scripts.install:all: cd apps/city-trail-lp && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm run build:lp && npm run build:mobile

scripts.build:mobile: cd apps/mobile && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev:lp & npm run dev:mobile
